name: Shiprocket Limited
description: Developer of an e-commerce shipping and enablement application designed to offer negotiated freight rates. The company's platform employs a machine-learning-based data engine that recommends proper courier service for a business and chooses a courier company, prints shipping labels, and tracks orders from a single panel, enabling businesses to manage their shipping and returns simply and effectively.
one_liner: Developer of an e-commerce shipping and enablement application designed to offer negotiated freight rates. The company's platform employs a machine-learning-based data engine that recommends proper courier service for a business and chooses a courier company, prints shipping labels, and tracks orders from a single panel, enabling businesses to manage their shipping and returns simply and effectively.
